descriptionHTML:
Calming fog watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Calming fog Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Calming fog Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ 24-hour time format
✔ Battery level
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month

How to use Calming fog Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Calming fog watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Calming fog Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:
FWF Market : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=bb.fwf.market
comments: The design is perfect, love the cursive but the day of the week and widget don't populate. So much potential..
Day of the week doesn't show in watch face
Nice, let me browse what i could do with the apps
Works great on my lg urbane

Tried very hard to make this app work on the Huawei watch with AW2.0 . If you download the app on your phone it will not automatically transfer to the watch , you need to then go to the watch and download it again . When I got it on the watch , it kept flickering and eventually crashed. Beautiful watchface but has function issues.
